entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain mixed with snow in the morning. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Amount 10 mm. Wind becoming south 40 km/h gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
